names.english: eliminate dryness and moisten the intestines decoction
names.commonEnglish: Eliminate Dryness and Moisten the Intestines Decoction

actions: Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin and generates fluids.
Tonifies the Blood, moistens the Intestines and unblocks the bowels.
Drains Heat, moistens Lung Dryness and generates Fluids.
With Sheng Di Huang, for parched, dry stools with damaged Yin.
Nourishes Kidney Yin, clears Lung Heat, moistens the Lungs and generates Fluids.
Astringes sweat, tonifies the Kidneys, astringes Jing and generates fluids.

syndromes: Deficiency of Fluid in the Large Intestine

symptoms: Knotted constipation or bowel movements once a day
